text: Lucky the Leprechaun is getting another magical friend. General Mills has announced it will be adding a new marshmallow to Lucky Charms — a unicorn. It ’ s the first substantial change to the cereal in roughly 10 years. The unicorn, which will replace the hourglass marshmallow, was chosen after the company solicited suggestions on social media.
